text: on the day I was born the doctor said I
would have no chance of survival
I suffer from microcephaly my skull is
smaller than average the doctor gave his
diagnosis she will not walk she will not
talk and over time she will enter into a
vegetative state until she dies he like
many others was wrong I grew up I went
to school I went to university and today
I'm a journalist
I chose journalism to give a voice to
people like me who do not feel
represented with the spike of
microcephaly cases in Brazil the need
for information is more important than
ever and people need to leave their
prejudices aside the Minister of Health
for example he said that Brazil will
have a damaged generation because of
microcephaly if I had a chance to talk
to him I would tell him what is damaged
is your statement sir
because microcephaly is a box of
surprises you may suffer from serious
problems or you may not I believe that
those who opt to have abortions do not
give their children a chance to succeed
and survive as it happened with me I
survived and lived as so many others
with microcephaly do our mothers did not
choose abortion that is why we exist
